[00:02.44]Written by：Brian Wilson/Mike Love
[00:04.88]Oooooooo
[00:06.72]Merry Christmas Saint Nick
[00:08.65]Christmas comes this time each year
[00:11.65]Oooooooo
[00:12.02]
[00:15.30]Well way up north where the air gets cold
[00:18.65]There's a tale about Christmas
[00:20.43]That you've all been told
[00:22.27]And a real famous cat all dressed up in red
[00:25.93]All he spends all year workin' out on his sled
[00:29.61]It's the little Saint Nick
[00:31.53]Little Saint Nick
[00:33.42]It's the little Saint Nick
[00:35.18]Little Saint Nick
[00:36.89]Just a little bobsled we call the old Saint Nick
[00:40.52]But she'll walk a toboggan with a four speed stick
[00:43.90]
[00:44.42]She's candy apple red with a ski for a wheel
[00:47.93]And when Santa hits the gas man just watch her peel
[00:51.34]It's the little Saint Nick
[00:53.09]Little Saint Nick
[00:55.22]It's the little Saint Nick
[00:56.98]Little Saint Nick
[00:58.51]
[00:59.37]Run run reindeer
[01:00.89]

[01:03.57]
[01:06.75]Whoaa
[01:07.01]Run run reindeer
[01:10.29]Run run reindeer
[01:12.48]He don't miss no one
[01:13.81]And haulin' through the snow at a frightening speed
[01:17.15]With a half a dozen deer with Rudy to lead
[01:20.44]
[01:21.39]He's got to wear his goggles cause the snow really flies
[01:24.62]And he's cruisin' every path with a little surprise
[01:28.23]It's the little Saint Nick
[01:30.08]Little Saint Nick
[01:31.38]

[01:33.88]Little Saint Nick

[00:04.88]//
[00:06.72]圣诞快乐 圣诞老人
[00:08.65]每年迎来 圣诞佳节
[00:11.65]//
[00:12.02]
[00:15.30]北方天气异常寒冷
[00:18.65]有个关于圣诞节的故事
[00:20.43]你们应该早有耳闻
[00:22.27]声名远扬的一只猫身穿红衣
[00:25.93]一年来他将心血投进雪橇里
[00:29.61]他就是大名鼎鼎的圣诞老人
[00:31.53]圣诞老人
[00:33.42]他就是大名鼎鼎的圣诞老人
[00:35.18]圣诞老人
[00:36.89]是个名为老圣尼克的小雪橇
[00:40.52]但她会用四条杆子踩长雪橇
[00:43.90]
[00:44.42]在滑雪橇的她原是拐杖糖的推销员
[00:47.93]当圣诞老人撞倒她时她会跌落在地
[00:51.34]他就是大名鼎鼎的圣诞老人
[00:53.09]圣诞老人
[00:55.22]他就是大名鼎鼎的圣诞老人
[00:56.98]圣诞老人
[00:58.51]
[00:59.37]奔跑吧驯鹿们
[01:00.89]
[01:02.89]奔跑吧驯鹿们
[01:03.57]
[01:06.75]//
[01:07.01]奔跑吧驯鹿们
[01:10.29]奔跑吧驯鹿们
[01:12.48]他从不落下每一只驯鹿
[01:13.81]他在雪中急速穿行
[01:17.15]由鲁迪带领驯鹿们
[01:20.44]
[01:21.39]他要带着护目镜因到处皆是飞雪
[01:24.62]每条街道上他都会留下惊喜礼物
[01:28.23]他就是大名鼎鼎的圣诞老人
[01:30.08]圣诞老人
